definitions.definition: A female who directs ; a directress .
A line used to define a curve or surface ; especially a line, the distance from which a point on a conic has a constant ratio to that from the focus .

main_definition: A female who directs ; a directress .
secondary_definitions: ( geometry ) A line used to define a curve or surface ; especially a line, the distance from which a point on a conic has a constant ratio to that from the focus .
